characters.name: Andrew
characters.description: Andrew is a nerd who knows everything, but he is also very unwilling to help with anything. Talk to him to get the homework list

characters.name: Jacob
characters.description: Jacob is a really good friend, he is willing to help with anything but he does cut corners here and there. Talk to him to get information about the cheatsheet

characters.name: Theodore
characters.description: The most fearsome bully in the whole school that does not give stuff out for the fun of it, he always wants something in return. Talk to him to get a deal for the cheatsheet

characters.name: Theodores classmate
characters.description: Not much is known about him, other than he has beef with Theodore. Steal his drawing compass to get the cheatsheet from Theodore

characters.name: Principal
characters.description: Grumpy principal that hates students that turn in their homework last second. Turn in your homework to finally be done
